about.description:
rubicon-ml is a machine learning solution designed to help standardize the model
development lifecycle. rubicon-ml can track, visualize and share experiments with
collaborators and reviewers as they develop, train and govern models designed
to solve complex business problems. It simplifies model governance, auditability
and reproducibility by tracking a wide range of model metadata.
about.summary: library and CLI for standardizing model development and governance

about.description:
rubicon-ml is a machine learning solution designed to help standardize the model
development lifecycle. rubicon-ml can track, visualize and share experiments with
collaborators and reviewers as they develop, train and govern models designed
to solve complex business problems. It simplifies model governance, auditability
and reproducibility by tracking a wide range of model metadata.
about.summary: library and CLI for standardizing model development and governance

name: rubicon-ml
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "rubicon-ml" %}
{% set version = "0.13.0" %}


package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name | replace('-', '_') }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 3f79f2cea61e652370da317e6652c0d7c876e532f074e483998cf0784f818d9b

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: python
  entry_points:
    - rubicon_ml=rubicon_ml.cli:cli
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv

requirements:
  host:
    - pip
    - python {{ python_min }}
  run:
    - click <=8.3.0,>=7.1
    - dash <=2.18.2,>=2.0.0
    - dash-bootstrap-components <=1.7.1,>=1.0.0
    - fsspec <=2025.9.0,>=2021.4.0
    - intake <=2.0.8,>=0.5.2
    - jsonpath-ng <=1.7.0,>=1.5.3
    - numpy <=2.3.3,>=1.22.0
    - pandas <=2.3.2,>=1.0
    - pyarrow <=21.0.0,>=14.0.1
    - python >={{ python_min }}
    - pyyaml <=6.0.2,>=5.4.0
    - s3fs <=2025.9.0,>=0.4
    - scikit-learn <=1.7.2,>=0.22.0

test:
  imports:
    - rubicon_ml
  commands:
    - rubicon_ml --help
  requires:
    - pip
    - python {{ python_min }}

about:
  home: https://github.com/capitalone/rubicon-ml
  doc_url: https://capitalone.github.io/rubicon-ml/
  summary: library and CLI for standardizing model development and governance
  license: Apache-2.0
  license_file: LICENSE
  description: |
    rubicon-ml is a machine learning solution designed to help standardize the model 
    development lifecycle. rubicon-ml can track, visualize and share experiments with 
    collaborators and reviewers as they develop, train and govern models designed 
    to solve complex business problems. It simplifies model governance, auditability 
    and reproducibility by tracking a wide range of model metadata.

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - joe-wolfe21
    - ryanSoley
    - mmccarty
    - dianelee217
